## Description {#details}

Option to choose whether to track sentinels.

This option affects the ABI for the nodes. When not specified explicitly, the ABI depends on LLVM&#95;ENABLE&#95;ABI&#95;BREAKING&#95;CHECKS. Specify explicitly to enable <em><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ilist-node-impl/#a0570092282570244c4d7af86003f0aa9">ilist&#95;node::isSentinel()</a></em>.

Definition at line 26 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/ilist-node-options-h">ilist&#95;node&#95;options.h</a>.
